name: Action Alien: Tropical Mayhem
description: Explore the sea with your boat and clear islands of tropical forests infested with aliens and nests !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
